text: Richard Westwood Worth (3 July 1948 â€“ 10 May 2022) was a New Zealand politician and lawyer. He was a member of the New Zealand National Party. He was the Member of Parliament for Epsom from 1999 to 2005 and a list MP from 2005 to 2009. Worth was born in Auckland, New Zealand. Worth was the Minister of Internal Affairs from 2008 until 2009 during the John Key government. Worth died on 10 May 2022 at the age of 73. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2022 deaths Category:New Zealand lawyers Category:Politicians from Auckland
title: Richard Worth
